items.title: Why some ant colonies get tricked into killing their own queens
bullets: • Some female ants practice a kind of chemical warfare that lets them sneak into the established colonies of other ant species and manipulate the worker ants into committing regicide
• The queen is paramount in an ant colony; the queen produces all the eggs, while the workers take care of her
• After a colony has been around awhile, however, it will start to produce some females capable of reproduction
• These females fly away, in order to establish new colonies and their own reigns
